alert.note: Alert for Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:24PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jackson County through 700 PM PDT... At 623 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prospect State Scenic Viewpoint, or 22 miles southwest of Crater Lake, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph, lightning, heavy rain, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Joseph Stewart State Park, Prospect and Prospect State Scenic Viewpoint. This includes the following highways... Highway 62 in Oregon between mile markers 33 and 49. Highway 66 in Oregon Highway 70 in Oregon Interstate 5 in Oregon US 101 in Oregon MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jackson County; Siskiyou Mountains and Southern Oregon Cascades; South Central Oregon Cascades
